mapper.select: select matchstatus, matchmethod, wantc, mdate, stime, etime, matchregion, money, bcontent, skill, bnum, btel,(SELECT count(*) FROM rboard2 t4 WHERE t4.bnum = t1.bnum ) as cnt from board2 t1 order by bnum desc

select bnum, matchstatus, matchmethod, wantc, mdate, stime, etime, matchregion, money, bcontent, skill, btel,(SELECT count(*) FROM rboard2 t4 WHERE t4.bnum = t1.bnum ) as cnt from (select row_number() over(order by bnum desc) as num, t1.bnum, t1.matchstatus, t1.matchmethod, t1.wantc, t1.mdate, t1.stime, t1.etime, t1.matchregion, t1.money, t1.bcontent, t1.skill, t1.btel from board2 t1, board_category t2 where t1.bcategory = t2.cid
and
mdate like '%'||#{item}||'%'
matchregion like '%'||#{item}||'%'
money like '%'||#{item}||'%'
mdate like '%'||#{item}||'%' or matchregion like '%'||#{item}||'%' or money like '%'||#{item}||'%'
) t1 order by bnum desc

select matchstatus, t2.cid as "boardCategoryVO.cid", t2.cname as "boardCategoryVO.cname", bcategory, matchmethod, wantc, mdate, stime, etime, matchregion, money, bcontent, skill, bnum, btel, bid, latitude, longitude, mapregion
from board2 t1, board_category t2 where t1.bcategory = t2.cid and t1.bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.update: update board2 set bcategory = #{boardCategoryVO.cid}, bcontent = #{bcontent}, matchstatus = #{matchstatus}, mdate = #{mdate}, matchmethod = #{matchmethod}, matchregion = #{matchregion}, money = #{money}, stime = #{stime}, etime = #{etime}, wantc = #{wantc}, budate = systimestamp where bnum = #{bnum}
